CustomField.description: Ensure the adviser has added this to household facts & conflicts register where appropriate, and note how this is being managed. E.g. employees of NW, family members of NW employees, friends, Octopus shareholders etc.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Ensure the adviser has added this to household facts & conflicts register where appropriate, and note how this is being managed. E.g. employees of NW, family members of NW employees, friends, Octopus shareholders etc.
CustomField.label: Notes on conflicts of interest
